name: Code Review
description: Automated code review for pull requests using multiple specialized agents with confidence-based scoring
longDescription: Adds a `/code-review` command that dispatches 5 parallel agents: `CLAUDE.md` compliance, bug detection, git-blame historical context, prior PR pattern matching, and code comment compliance. Each agent scores findings on a 0-100 confidence scale, and only issues scoring 80+ are included in the final PR comment to reduce noise.
